metadata.title: Commands: Snapshot Inspect
metadata.description: The `consul snapshot inspect` command outputs an atomic, point-in-time snapshot of the state of the Consul servers. Output includes key/value entries, registered services in the catalog, prepared queries, sessions, and ACLs.

mdxSource.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={};const MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components,...props}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...props,components:components,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Command: `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`consul snapshot inspect`)),mdx("p",null,`The `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`snapshot inspect`),` command is used to inspect an atomic, point-in-time
snapshot of the state of the Consul servers which includes key/value entries,
service catalog, prepared queries, sessions, and ACLs. The snapshot is read
from the given file.`),mdx("div",{"className":"alert alert-info g-type-body"},mdx("p",{parentName:"div"},`Typically this is used with Consul self-contained Snapshot files obtained
using the `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/consul/commands/snapshot"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`consul snapshot`)),` command or `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/consul/api-docs/snapshot#generate-snapshot"},`Snapshot
API`),`. If the file provided is named
`,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`state.bin`),` however, the command will assume it is a raw raft snapshot in a
Consul server data directory and will attempt to read it directly. The
`,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`state.bin`),` file must still be in the same directory as it's associated
`,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`meta.json`),` file. This is useful for debugging data on live servers without
making a complete new snapshot via the CLI or API first.`)),mdx("p",null,`The following fields are displayed when inspecting a snapshot:`),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"id","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#id","aria-label":"id permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`ID`)),` - A unique ID for the snapshot, only used for differentiation purposes.`)),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"size","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#size","aria-label":"size permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`Size`)),` - The size of the snapshot, in bytes.`)),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"index","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#index","aria-label":"index permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`Index`)),` - The Raft index of the latest log entry in the snapshot.`)),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"term","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#term","aria-label":"term permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`Term`)),` - The Raft term of the latest log entry in the snapshot.`)),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"version","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#version","aria-label":"version permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`Version`)),` - The snapshot format version. This only refers to the structure of
the snapshot, not the data contained within.`)),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},`Each data type, size, and count within the read snapshot.`))),mdx("h2",{"id":"usage"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#usage","aria-label":"usage permalink"},`\xbb`),`Usage`),mdx("p",null,`Usage: `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`consul snapshot inspect [options] FILE`)),mdx("h4",{"id":"command-options"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h4","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#command-options","aria-label":"command options permalink"},`\xbb`),`Command Options`),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"kvdetails","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#kvdetails","aria-label":"kvdetails permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`-kvdetails`)),` - Provides information about space usage for KV data stored in Consul.`)),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"kvdepth","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#kvdepth","aria-label":"kvdepth permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`-kvdepth`)),` - Adjusts the grouping levels of keys.
Can only be used with `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`-kvdetails`),`.
Default is `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`2`),`.`)),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"kvfilter","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"#kvfilter","aria-label":"kvfilter permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`-kvfilter`)),` - Only keys that match the specified key prefix

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
